title: Relates to requiring uniform prescription drug information cards
summary: Requires the use of uniform prescription drug information cards or technology for claims processing in a form approved by the national council for prescription drug programs and acceptable to the commissioner.

   11  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THIRD PARTY ADMINISTRATORS  FOR  SELF-IN-
   12  SURED  PLANS,  PHARMACY  BENEFITS MANAGERS AND STATE ADMINISTERED PLANS,
   13  SHALL ISSUE, USE, REQUIRE, AND/OR CONTRACT  WITH  OR  REQUIRE  FROM  THE
   14  OTHER  ENTITY, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO A PHARMACY BENEFIT MANAGER,
   15  FOR ITS INSUREDS A UNIFORM CARD OR OTHER TECHNOLOGY  CONTAINING  UNIFORM
   16  PRESCRIPTION DRUG INFORMATION. THE UNIFORM PRESCRIPTION DRUG INFORMATION
   17  CARD OR TECHNOLOGY SHALL BE IN THE FORMAT APPROVED BY THE NATIONAL COUN-
   18  CIL  FOR PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROGRAMS (NCPDP) AND SHALL INCLUDE ALL OF THE
   19  FIELDS REQUIRED BY THE INSURER, ORGANIZATION OR CORPORATION TO SUBMIT  A
   20  CLAIM  AND CONFORM TO THE MOST RECENT PHARMACY INFORMATION CARD OR TECH-
   21  NOLOGY IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE PRODUCED BY NCPDP OR CONFORM TO  A  NATIONAL
   22  FORMAT  ACCEPTABLE TO THE SUPERINTENDENT. ALL INFORMATION THAT IS NECES-
   23  SARY FOR CLAIMS SUBMISSION OF PRESCRIPTION DRUG BENEFITS,  EXCLUSIVE  OF

    4  CLAIMS  PROCESSING.  ALL INFORMATION INCLUDED ON THE CARD OR OTHER TECH-
    5  NOLOGY AS REQUIRED BY THIS SECTION BUT NOT SPECIFIED BY THE NCPDP  SHALL
    6  CONFORM  TO  A  CONTENT AND FORMAT ACCEPTABLE TO THE SUPERINTENDENT. ALL
    7  INFORMATION ON THE CARD MUST BE FORMATTED AND ARRANGED IN A MANNER  THAT
    8  CORRESPONDS BOTH IN CONTENT AND FORMAT TO THE CURRENT CONTENT AND FORMAT
    9  REQUIRED BY THE PLAN TO PROCESS THE CLAIM. IF AN INSURER OR ORGANIZATION
   10  OR CORPORATION LICENSED, ORGANIZED OR CERTIFIED PURSUANT TO THIS CHAPTER
   11  OR ARTICLE FORTY-FOUR OF THE PUBLIC HEALTH LAW REQUIRES A CONDITIONAL OR
   12  SITUATIONAL  FIELD AS DEFINED BY THE NCPDP, IT SHALL CONFORM TO THE MOST
   13  RECENT PHARMACY INFORMATION  CARD  OR  TECHNOLOGY  IMPLEMENTATION  GUIDE
   14  PRODUCED  BY THE NCPDP OR CONFORM TO A NATIONAL FORMAT ACCEPTABLE TO THE
   15  SUPERINTENDENT.
   16    (B) A NEW UNIFORM PRESCRIPTION DRUG INFORMATION CARD OR OTHER TECHNOL-
   17  OGY, AS REQUIRED UNDER SUBSECTION (A) OF THIS SECTION SHALL  BE  ISSUED,
   18  USED,  AND/OR  REQUIRED  BY  AN  INSURER  OR ORGANIZATION OR CORPORATION
   19  LICENSED, ORGANIZED OR CERTIFIED PURSUANT TO  THIS  CHAPTER  OR  ARTICLE
   20  FORTY-FOUR  OF THE PUBLIC HEALTH LAW, AND/OR BY THE INSURER'S, ORGANIZA-
   21  TION'S OR CORPORATION'S CONTRACTS WITH OR  REQUIREMENT  FROM  THE  OTHER
   22  ENTITY,  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, A PHARMACY BENEFIT MANAGER, UPON
   23  ENROLLMENT AND REISSUED OR REQUIRED UPON ANY CHANGE IN  THE  CERTIFICATE
   24  HOLDER'S COVERAGE THAT IMPACTS DATA IN CONTENT OR FORMAT AS CONTAINED ON
   25  THE  CARD  THAT AFFECTS THE DATA CONTENT OR FORMAT REQUIRED TO BE ON THE
   26  CARD OR OTHER TECHNOLOGY AS REQUIRED BY SUBSECTION (A) OF  THIS  SECTION
   27  OR UPON A CHANGE IN THE NCPDP IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE OR SUCCESSOR DOCUMENT
   28  THAT AFFECTS DATA CONTENT OR FORMAT CONTAINED ON THE CARD OR OTHER TECH-
   29  NOLOGY AS REQUIRED BY SUBSECTION (A) OF THIS SECTION. NEWLY ISSUED, USED
   30  OR  REQUIRED  CARDS OR OTHER TECHNOLOGY SHALL BE UPDATED WITH THE LATEST
   31  COVERAGE INFORMATION AND SHALL CONFORM TO THE NCPDP  STANDARDS  THEN  IN
   32  EFFECT  AND TO THE IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE THEN IN USE OR THE FORMAT SPECI-
   33  FIED BY THE SUPERINTENDENT. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT  ANY  SUCH  INSURER,
   34  ORGANIZATION OR CORPORATION OR ANY ENTITY THAT THE INSURER, ORGANIZATION
   35  OR  CORPORATION CONTRACTS WITH OR REQUIRES FROM PURSUANT TO THE REQUIRE-
   36  MENTS OF THIS SECTION MAY  ISSUE  STICKERS  OR  OTHER  METHODOLOGIES  TO
   37  UPDATE CARDS TEMPORARILY AS MAY BE ACCEPTABLE TO THE SUPERINTENDENT.
   38    (C)  THE  CARD  OR OTHER TECHNOLOGY MAY BE USED FOR ANY AND ALL HEALTH
   39  INSURANCE COVERAGE. NOTHING IN THIS SECTION REQUIRES ANY PERSON ISSUING,
   40  USING OR REQUIRING THE CARD OR THEIR TECHNOLOGY TO ISSUE, USE OR REQUIRE
   41  A SEPARATE CARD FOR PRESCRIPTION COVERAGE, PROVIDED  THAT  THE  CARD  OR
   42  OTHER  TECHNOLOGY  CAN  ACCOMMODATE THE INFORMATION NECESSARY TO PROCESS
   43  THE CLAIM AS REQUIRED BY SUBSECTION (A) OF THIS SECTION.
